reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a high-quality piece with a perfect fit, particularly noting its sleeves and length. They describe it as feminine, comfortable, and flattering, with one customer mentioning how it draws in slim at the waist. The material receives positive feedback for being heavy enough and not see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, true to size
items.body: This dress is wonderful. I got at least 10 or more compliments on the this dress. Even when I was sitting down. I also had people ask me to stand up to see the Dress. I brought this dress, because we have Communion on the 3rd Sunday each month, and we wear white. I would like to buy another in a different color. Comfortable, length is perfect, fabric is light, and the value was great. I brought during the Amazon prime sale. Even without the sale it is worth the price. Thank you so much Augusta A Smith Read more
items.author: Augusta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection at a low cost!
items.body: The color of the dress, stunning. The fit beautiful. The fabric, easy to steam. I have no notes. Buy the dress! Itâ€™s so flattering! The perfect length, a gorgeous pleat. The price hit the mark. Perfection! Read more
items.author: Amanda Donajkowski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will not regret this purchase
items.body: Purchases this dress for a celebration of life ceremony for a recently departed loved one. This dress was perfect, thick material so that it wasnt see-thru, fit is true to size and has flexibility. Color is pure white and not off-white. I love this dress ðŸ‘— and great value, super comfortable and retains shape while worn. Read more
items.author: DaVina Crawford

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: I did not expect the outcome- nice dress, just not a good fit for me. I wanted a pleated dress look, just had something else in mind. I did not return it because my mom loves it. It looks better on her. Very comfortable and loose flowing dress- perfect length as well Read more
items.author: Renee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Midi Women Dress
items.body: Love the color, fit. length and pleats. Wish I had made a second purchase for the price, for me the size is great. When I first made the purchase I had lost a bit of weight but and the dress was a good fit but after pick some weight back up it fit great the purchase is a large. Very pleased with this dress Read more
items.author: Lisa M Baxter

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bad packaging
items.body: I love the dress. Perfect fit and length. The packaging left wrinkles in the dress that are difficult to remove. I have steamed and ironed it with no results. The vacuum package is not good. Read more
items.author: Linda Carrolll

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The size runs big.
items.body: The dress is really nice, but itâ€™s too big all over for me. I will be returning it. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 010-grey, 004-royal Blue, 012-orange, 016-light Purple, 005-wine Red, 003-black, 008-navy Blue, 001-white, 007-red, 013-aqua, 014-green, 002-deep Purple, 015-light Blue, 006-dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
